body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Lawrence Taylor and I represent Car Dealership Inc.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I kindly ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Lawrence, my name is Tammy Gray.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Tammy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my recent bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'll do my best to help. Can you please provide me with your account number and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My account number is four five six two three, and my phone number is nine eight seven six five four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information. I'll look up your account now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the necessary details, Tammy. I appreciate your time. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Lawrence.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Tammy. If you have any more questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
